text: Moonraker is a 1979 British French American science fiction spy action movie directed by Lewis Gilbert and is the 11th movie in the James Bond franchise. It stars Roger Moore, Lois Chiles, Michael Lonsdale, Richard Kiel, Corinne Cl√©ry, Bernard Lee, Desmond Llewelyn, Geoffrey Keen, Lois Maxwell. It was distributed by United Artists and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1980. Shirley Bassey sings the title song of the movie. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1979 science fiction movies Category:1979 action movies Category:1970s spy movies Category:British science fiction movies Category:French science fiction movies Category:French action movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American action movies Category:American spy movies Category:James Bond movies Category:Movies about technology Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in Venice Category:Movies set in Brazil Category:Movies directed by Lewis Gilbert Category:Movies composed by John Barry Category:Roger Moore
title: Moonraker (movie)
